name: Perceptions of U.S. STEM education compared with other nations at K–12 and university levels: 2019
description: Perceptions of U.S. STEM education compared with other nations at K–12 and university levels: 2019

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

notes: Responses are to the following: I'd like you to compare the United States to other nations in a few different ways. Do you think the U.S. is the best in the world, above average, average or below average? Its science, technology, engineering and math education in grades K to 12. Its science, technology, engineering and math education in colleges and universities.
sources: Pew Research Center, International Science Survey (2019–20), conducted in the United States 1–28 October 2019.Science and Engineering Indicators
